column2: I don‚Äôt know why people choose my feed to argue over politics & whose fault things are? We take $ & aid from all parties‚Ä¶.being a suffering human being transcends any political party. #bstrong

So riddle me this‚Ä¶everyone says it‚Äôs mental illness bc it‚Äôs scary & erratic & abusive‚Ä¶how is it all so intentional & strategic w no aberration when an album drops? Honest not loaded question. Is this not marketing?
